rules_text:
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a land and/or a creature card from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Vista – Discard Etherchannel Cliff: Create a tapped treasure token. [i](Activate as a sorcery, instead of playing a land on your turn.)[/i]
notes: Maybe make a cheaper tutor or make discard
